#summary &vert; character entity

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesV V] > &vert;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Vert;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2016/index.htm U+02016].
  * `&vert;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/007c/index.htm U+0007C].
